programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 14 Sooners take on the No. 24 Wolverines. Oklahoma is off to a second straight 10-0 start after a Bedlam Series win over Oklahoma State on Dec. 14. Michigan had its seven-game win streak snapped by Arkansas at the Jimmy V Classic on Dec. 10.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: To save her family's hotel Christmas show, a talent booker must ask for help from her ex-boyfriend -- the lead guitarist of a now-famous band that fired her as its manager years ago.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: Christmas With a Kiss
programme.desc: A woman returns home to help with her family's Christmas Carnival, and romance ignites. A photo journalist curates a surprise reunion.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Lizzie Richfield lands a job as house manager for the exquisite Ashford Estate in the Virginia countryside. While preparing the place for sale, Lizzie plans one final Christmas Eve gala for the family, although they seem to be a family in name only.

programme.title: A Biltmore Christmas
programme.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove to the set of the 1947 holiday movie classic "His Merry Wife!" However, before she can return to the present, Lucy must make things right or threaten to alter the future forever.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: Department store employee Noelle visits Christmases of past, present and future as her guardian angel helps her navigate her wishes for a connection with her father, her dream career and love.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Leah's 30th birthday is on Christmas Eve, the same day as her brother's wedding. Her childhood crush is back in town for the ceremony and he's determined to make sure her special day doesn't go by the wayside.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.

programme.title: Christmas on Call
programme.desc: The lives of First Responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Double Holiday
programme.desc: Rebecca must throw the company holiday party with her office rival, Chris. It coincides with Hanukkah, so she must juggle her work, family traditions, and nemesis to make the party a success.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: When a writer has her column canceled right before Christmas, she heads home to reconnect with her family, only to receive an unexpected visit from the man who canceled her column.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria hopes being selected for Sterling Masters' Big Holiday Adventure will save Christmas in Midway. Little does she know that Alex Bartlett is the voice behind Sterling Masters.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: The Santa Class
programme.desc: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner finds romance with a handsome local after traveling to a remote town in Alaska to find a rare flower for a celebrity client.

programme.title: A Song for Christmas
programme.desc: A pop star becomes stranded in a small town in the dead of winter and finds refuge at a family's beleaguered dairy farm.

programme.title: Magic Stocking
programme.desc: Lindsey, a widowed single mother, stays closed off to life after losing her husband. When she buys a stocking at a craft fair, her family members begin finding items in it that have importance in their lives.

programme.title: Magical Christmas Ornaments
programme.desc: Marie finds her Christmas spirit reawakened when her mother begins sending her the family's Christmas ornaments. As each ornament arrives, it brings a positive change to Marie's life, including an introduction to the handsome man from next door.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: Two Turtle Doves
programme.desc: Dr. Sharon Hayes returns home to search for a beloved family heirloom. With the help of an adorable little girl and her dispirited father, together they rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: Sleigh Bells Ring
programme.desc: A busy single mother (Erin Cahill) begins organizing her city's Christmas parade. While prop hunting, she finds a beautiful sleigh that seems to have a mind of its own, and it begins nudging her back to an old flame (David Alpay).

programme.title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas
programme.desc: When a New England Christmas decorating competition searches for the town with the most Christmas spirit, the mayors of East and West Riverton go all out to get their towns to the top of the holiday heap.

programme.title: Christmas in Love
programme.desc: Ellie must decide if she should trust the big city CEO she is falling for, but more importantly, whether to take a leap of faith in making her own dreams come true.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: A skeptical writer shows up in Evergreen to get the scoop on the town's famed passion for Christmas during a search for a long-lost time capsule.

programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas
programme.desc: Anne seems to have it all as a driven toy buyer in New York City, but her father's retirement signaling the closing of the town's beloved toy store brings the city girl back to her small-town roots.

programme.title: Our Italian Christmas Memories
programme.desc: As their grandfather struggles with dementia, the Colucci siblings set out to re-create their late grandmother's legendary pasta sauce to help jog his memory.

programme.title: Northpole: Open for Christmas
programme.desc: During Christmastime a handyman and an elf persuade a businesswoman to keep the inn that she inherited from her aunt.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: A Dance in the Snow
programme.desc: Melanie wants to create an inclusive Christmas dance for her daughter Jenny, not realizing Jenny is planning a dance of her own to honor Melanie.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: America's national security team must rely on a disgraced former guard (Gerard Butler) to save the president (Aaron Eckhart) after terrorists seize control of the White House, taking the chief of state hostage.

programme.title: London Has Fallen

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: Kallithea - Olympiacos

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Zaragoza - Barcelona
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Galatasaray - Trabzon
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: NCAA College Soccer: Finale
programme.desc: Donosimo vam najbolje trenutke sa Američkog fudbalskog turnira na kome učestvuju fakulteti. Ovaj uzbudljiv sportski događaj odvija se pod pokroviteljstvom Nacionalne akademske atletske asocijacije...

programme.title: Put do vrha
programme.desc: Neverovatne priče o usponu tamnoputih sportista do samog vrha: Između ostalih, Lebron Džejms i Serena Vilijams...

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Odbojka (Ž) - Klupsko SP: Conegliano - Praia
programme.desc: Najbolji odbojkaši i odbojkašice sveta bore se za titulu najboljeg kluba i pozamašnu novčanu nagradu. Biće zanimljivo videti i sudare različitih stilova.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarski kup: 1/8 Finala: CSKA 1948 - Ludogorets
programme.desc: Kup Bugarske u fudbalu održava se još od 1938. godine. U takmičenju učestvuju svi zvanično registrovani klubovi, sve utakmice se igraju na sistem eliminacija, sve do polufinala kada se igraju i...

programme.title: Pregled Bundeslige
programme.desc: Uz sve ono što nam je Nemačka podarila kroz istoriju ponosno stoji i Bundesliga. Najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja osnovanog 1963. godine broji 18 ekipa koje svakog avgusta kreću u trku za popularnim...

programme.title: MUTV: Manchester City - Manchester United (PL)
programme.desc: Donosimo vam najnovije vesti i reportaže iz "Mančester junajteda", kluba velike tradicije i reputacije. Klub je osnovan 1878. godine i tokom decenija je iznedrio velike fudbalske zvezde.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Barcelona - Fenerbahce
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled Jedrenje: Vendee Globe
programme.desc: Vendée Globe je jedna od najzahtevnijih regata za jedriličare na svetu. U ovom takmičenju jedriličari su sami na svojim plovilima u trci oko sveta.

programme.title: E-Sports: CS2 - Shanghai Major 2024
programme.desc: Najbolji Counter-Strike timovi sveta doleću u Šangaj kako bi se borili na drugom ovogodišnjem Major turniru. Da li će NAVI odbraniti titulu ili će G2 otplesati svoj poslednji ples sa dugo očekivanim...

programme.title: Koledž košarka: Florida - North Carolina
programme.desc: NCAA je najpoznatiji košarkaški turnir univerziteta na svetu! Obavezno i ovog proleća pratite ko će biti najbolja univerzitetska ekipa u SAD-u i koje će možda buduće NBA zvezde zablistati. (LIVE).

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Frisco Bowl: West Virginia - Memphis
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na... (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Porto - Estrela Amadora
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.
